item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: HTML-to-Markdown – convert entire websites to Markdown with Golang/CLI (20 points | 3 comments)
2. Delta: A syntax-highlighting pager for Git, diff, grep, and blame output (387 points | 56 comments)
3. Texture-Less Text Rendering (42 points | 16 comments)
4. Mitochondria Are Alive (520 points | 327 comments)
5. SVDQuant: 4-Bit Quantization Powers 12B Flux on a 16GB 4090 GPU with 3x Speedup (40 points | 3 comments)
6. Multiple new macOS sandbox escape vulnerabilities (519 points | 161 comments)
7. Can humans say the largest prime number before we find the next one? (178 points | 70 comments)
8. In Memory of Stiver (381 points | 40 comments)
9. 'Smart' insulin prevents diabetic highs – and deadly lows (81 points | 16 comments)
10. Optimize Database Performance in Ruby on Rails and ActiveRecord (36 points | 13 comments)
11. Stabilizing the Obra Dinn 1-bit dithering process (2017) (460 points | 88 comments)
12. Obtainium: Get Android App Updates Directly from the Source (26 points | 15 comments)
13. A CC-By Open-Source TTS Model with Voice Cloning (65 points | 10 comments)
14. When you ask ChatGPT "Tell me a story" it's always is about a girl named Elara (27 points | 19 comments)
15. I quit Google to work for myself (2018) (230 points | 130 comments)
16. Maxun: Open-Source No-Code Web Data Extraction Platform (33 points | 3 comments)
17. Making Electronic Calipers (127 points | 41 comments)
18. Reconstruction of Lomonosov's Discovery of Venus's Atmosphere (2012) [pdf] (13 points | 3 comments)
19. Segmenting Credit Card Customers with K-Means: A Fun Dive into Clustering (3 points | 1 comment)
20. Λ-2D: An Exploration of Drawing as Programming Language (204 points | 51 comments)
21. Show HN: Asterogue, my sci-fi roguelike, is now playable on the web (284 points | 85 comments)
22. Python Logic Simulation Library (71 points | 4 comments)
23. Funding restored for man-page maintenance (61 points | 40 comments)
24. LoRA vs. Full Fine-Tuning: An Illusion of Equivalence (215 points | 49 comments)
25. A Brief History of Cyrix (37 points | 6 comments)
26. Claude AI to process secret government data through new Palantir deal (184 points | 109 comments)
27. A Random Walk Through Ada (2014) (20 points | discuss)
28. Perceptually lossless (talking head) video compression at 22kbit/s (207 points | 129 comments)
29. My Notes on Apple Math Notes (114 points | 34 comments)
30. Zep AI (YC W24) Is Hiring DevRel / Community Managers to Build Agent Memory ( | hide)
